text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia lorellae is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 2 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
European waters (ERMS scope): Mediterranean Sea
text.External links:
